name: Interim Capital
tag_list: financing, loan, bridge, debt, growth, restructuring, purchase-order, alternative, montreal, quebec, canada, financement, pret, interimaire, dette, croissance, restructuration, bon-de-commande, alternatif, bridge-loan, bridge-loan-financing
overview: INTERIM Capital is a privately held financing company providing fast response to capital needs of small and medium sized enterprises. INTERIM Capital provides secured bridge loans in order for entrepreneurs to meet their business objectives in times when traditional lending is not available.
